metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Darkly comedic crime drama with a strong mystery element, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'The Night Manager' but with a unique Coen Brothers' sensibility.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on a classic detective, offering intricate mysteries and strong character dynamics, appealing to fans of crime dramas.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and satirical themes through a sci-fi lens, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and dark humor.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with heart, exploring morality and the afterlife with humor and surprising twists, reminiscent of 'Ted Lasso' but in a fantastical setting.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Meta and fast-paced comedy with a strong ensemble cast, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny' but with a focus on pop culture.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Cult comedy with a dysfunctional family and witty writing, sharing similar humor as 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British comedy with a unique POV style, exploring the awkwardness of everyday life with dark humor, suitable for fans of 'Goodness Gracious Me' and 'Brassic'

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: British sitcom with a focus on eccentric characters working in the IT department, appealing to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'The Simpsons' humor.

metas.name: Attack on Titan
metas.description: Dark and intense anime with complex characters and action-packed battles, appealing to fans of 'One-Punch Man' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Cowboy Bebop
metas.description: Classic anime blending sci-fi, action, and a cool jazz soundtrack, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and unique animation styles.

metas.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
metas.description: Critically acclaimed anime with a compelling story, great characters, and themes of morality and sacrifice, appealing to fans of anime and complex plots.

metas.name: Gravity Falls
metas.description: Animated series with mystery and humor, appealing to fans of 'The Simpsons' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Over the Garden Wall
metas.description: Animated miniseries with a dark and whimsical atmosphere, blending fantasy and humor, suitable for fans of unique animation and storytelling.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: German sci-fi mystery series with complex time travel elements and a compelling narrative, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian thriller with a unique premise and unsettling atmosphere, appealing to fans of sci-fi and mystery.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with political intrigue and space battles, appealing to fans of 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Battlestar Galactica
metas.description: Reimagining of the classic sci-fi series, with strong characters, moral dilemmas, and intense action, fitting for fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Sci-fi Western with complex themes and stunning visuals, exploring artificial intelligence and the nature of humanity, appealing to fans of 'Fallout' and thought-provoking narratives.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Psychological thriller with a focus on hacking and social commentary, appealing to fans of dark and suspenseful dramas.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: British police procedural focusing on corruption within the police force, appealing to fans of crime dramas.

metas.name: Happy Valley
metas.description: British crime drama with strong female lead and a gripping storyline, fitting for fans of crime shows.

metas.name: Mare of Easttown
metas.description: Crime drama with a small-town setting and a complex female detective, appealing to fans of character-driven mysteries.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: Period drama with a strong female lead and a compelling storyline, appealing to fans of character-driven dramas.

metas.name: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
metas.description: Comedy-drama with a witty script and a strong female lead, appealing to fans of 'Ted Lasso' and character-driven comedies.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Mockumentary-style comedy with a heart, featuring a likable cast and optimistic themes, suitable for fans of 'Ted Lasso' and 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Police comedy with a diverse cast and witty humor, similar to 'Scrubs' but set in a police precinct.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary comedy about vampires living in modern times, appealing to fans of dark humor and unique comedy styles.

metas.name: Curb Your Enthusiasm
metas.description: Improv-based comedy with awkward situations and cringe humor, appealing to fans of 'It's Always Sunny' and uncomfortable comedy.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy-drama with a dark and satirical edge, exploring themes of depression and addiction, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Archer
metas.description: Animated spy comedy with a sharp wit and over-the-top characters, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and adult animation.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with brutal action and a compelling story, appealing to fans of 'One-Punch Man' and dark superhero narratives.

metas.name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
metas.description: Visually stunning and action-packed anime set in the Cyberpunk universe, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and dystopian sci-fi.

metas.name: Dorohedoro
metas.description: Dark and bizarre anime with a unique world and a blend of action, comedy, and horror, appealing to fans of offbeat anime and violent action.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy-mystery series with a quirky and unpredictable plot, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and unconventional mysteries.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy about the afterlife in a digital world, appealing to fans of 'The Good Place' and humorous takes on sci-fi concepts.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy about an alien who crash lands on Earth and takes on the identity of a small-town doctor, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and quirky comedies.

metas.name: Sense8
metas.description: Sci-fi drama with a diverse cast and complex themes of connection and identity, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and thought-provoking sci-fi.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Spy thriller with a sci-fi twist, exploring parallel universes and the consequences of choices, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and complex narratives.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: Spy thriller with a dark sense of humor and a compelling cat-and-mouse dynamic between two female leads, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and character-driven thrillers.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and gritty British crime drama with a brilliant but troubled detective, appealing to fans of 'All Her Fault' and suspenseful crime stories.
